result.arabic_text: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةٗ وَءَاوَيۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبۡوَةٖ ذَاتِ قَرَارٖ وَمَعِينٖ
result.translation: 50. Kaadu maryam baxa Nabii Qiisaa kee kay ina astay Ni-dudda elle yaaxigceni ken abneeh, baaxok fayya iyya aracay madabah missa meqey gexxa lee-lel dabqah ken hayne.
